title: Monitoring multicountry macroeconomic risk. (arXiv:2305.09563v1 [econ.EM])
abstract: We propose a multicountry quantile factor augmeneted vector autoregression (QFAVAR) to model heterogeneities both across countries and across characteristics of the distributions of macroeconomic time series. The presence of quantile factors allows for summarizing these two heterogeneities in a parsimonious way. We develop two algorithms for posterior inference that feature varying level of trade-off between estimation precision and computational speed. Using monthly data for the euro area, we establish the good empirical properties of the QFAVAR as a tool for assessing the effects of global shocks on country-level macroeconomic risks. In particular, QFAVAR short-run tail forecasts are more accurate compared to a FAVAR with symmetric Gaussian errors, as well as univariate quantile autoregressions that ignore comovements among quantiles of macroeconomic variables. We also illustrate how quantile impulse response functions and quantile connectedness measures, resulting from the new model

translated_title: 监测多国宏观经济风险
translated_abstract: 我们提出了一种多国量化分位数因子增强向量自回归（QFAVAR）模型，用于建模宏观经济时间序列分布的跨国以及跨特征异质性。量化因子的存在允许以简明的方式总结这两种异质性。我们开发了两种后验推断算法，具有不同的估计精度和计算速度的平衡。使用欧元区的月度数据，我们建立了 QFAVAR 作为一种工具，用于评估全球冲击对国家层面宏观经济风险的影响，并证实了其良好的经验性质。尤其是，与具有对称高斯误差的 FAVAR 以及忽略宏观经济变量分位数之间共同变化的单变量量化自回归相比，QFAVAR 短期尾部预测更准确。我们还说明了由新型模型产生的量化脉冲响应函数和量化联系度量。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种多国量化分位数因子增强向量自回归（QFAVAR）模型，用于监测和评估全球冲击对各国宏观经济风险的影响。该模型的短期尾部预测较其他方法更准确。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a multicountry quantile factor augmented vector autoregression (QFAVAR) model for monitoring and evaluating the impact of global shocks on macroeconomic risks across countries. The QFAVAR short-run tail forecast is more accurate compared to other methods, making it a useful tool for assessing macroeconomic risks.
